description: Details pursuant to Condition 28 (Mechanical Ventilation) and 29 (NO2 System Intake Details) granted under planning reference 2015/6955/P dated 01/11/17 and 2021/1918/P dated 07/07/21 for redevelopment of the site following partial demolition of Panther House and Brain Yard buildings, partial demolition of 160-164 Gray's Inn Road and demolition of 156 Gray's Inn Road. Proposals would result in part 4 storey, part 7 storey (plus plant and basement) buildings at Panther House and Brain Yard for predominantly employment (B1) uses (including 1450sq.m of subsidised workspaces) and a new 7 storey (plus plant and basement) building at 156-164 Gray's Inn Road behind the retained facade of 160-164 Gray's Inn Road to provide flexible retail/restaurant (A1/3) uses at ground and basement levels with 15 self-contained residential units (C3) (including 3 Intermediate Rent flats) at the upper levels. Associated landscaping, plant and public realm works.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name:
Panther House
 38 Mount Pleasant  The Brain Yard
